summary: Aboard a British train, mysterious fortune teller Dr. Schreck uses tarot cards to read the futures of five fellow passengers.
cast: Peter Cushing|Neil McCallum|Ursula Howells|Peter Madden|Katy Wild|Alan Freeman|Ann Bell|Phoebe Nicholls|Bernard Lee|Jeremy Kemp|Roy Castle|Kenny Lynch|Christopher Carlos|The Tubby Hayes Combo|Christopher Lee|Michael Gough|Donald Sutherland|Jennifer Jayne|Max Adrian|John Adams|Thomas Baptiste|Frank Barry|Isla Blair|Pauline Chamberlain|Judy Cornwell|Dan Darnelli|Frank Forsyth|Caron Gardner|Brian Hawkins|Russ Henderson|Boscoe Holder|Faith Kent|Kenneth Kove|Harold Lang|Laurie Leigh|John Martin|Louis Matto|John More|George Mossman|Al Mulock|Richard Neller|Paul Phillips|John Preston|Irene Richmond|Bess Rogers|Russ Henderson Steel Band|Bunny Seaman|Ian Selby|Paddy Smith|Walter Sparrow|Valerie St. Clair|Edward Underdown|Hedger Wallace
title: Doctor Terror
